text: Abdiqasim Salad Hassan (;With various transliterations into English, e.g. Abdiqaasim Salaad Hassan, Abdi Qaasim, etc. ; born on January 1, 1942) or Abdiqasim Salad is a Somali politician. He helped found the Transitional National Government. He was President of Somalia from 2000 to 2004. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Somalia
title: Abdiqasim Salad Hassan
